name: Shinetech Europe
tagline: Great software starts with great people
description:
Innovation and team coordination shape the way we do our business. Shinetech is at the forefront of software development, enterprise mobile app development and digital strategy consulting. Serving as a software development outsourcing partner for clients worldwide. We provide flexible teams comprising 1-8 full stack developers to accommodate your various development requirements and add value to your rapidly evolving business.
By closely working with our clients in an Agile development method, we aim to deliver our industry expertise in harnessing the digital transformation of your business process and become your trustworthy business partner.
